author: philip
msg: (no_spurious_conflict): Enable sleep for timestamps so that all

author: scottbw
msg: Implemented two changes to the folder localization algorithm: (1) when receiving a request for a widget start page (including id key) don't skip the localization algorithm as the start file may be incorrectly localized, and (2) check for defaultLocale before checking non-localized resources, as per the W3C Widgets P&C spec

author: scottbw
msg: Ensure we actually set the value of defaultLocale and lang when installing a widget on the server - silly omission when implementing WOOKIE-211
